Steve Arnold , an analyst who heads the firm Steve ArnoldIT, faulted Eric Schmidt for leaving Google too dependent on search advertising. It has not diversified its revenue streams in a meaningful way, Steve Arnold said. The financial success that Google has enjoyed has been largely due to ad sales, and was probably little influenced by Eric Schmidt , he said.
